alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Kinney; Maverick; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:32AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Kinney, Maverick, Dimmit and Zavala Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 132 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Darling to 6 miles northeast of El Indio to 28 miles west of Chupadera Ranch Airport. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eagle Pass, Crystal City, Carrizo Springs, Big Wells, Quemado, La Pryor, El Indio, Asherton, Chula Vista, Chula Vista-River Spur, Darling, Las Colonias, Brundage, Carrizo Hill, Gilson Groves, Rosita, Paloma, Washer, Winter Haven and Cometa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
